name: Dragon Adventure (itch) (raghav_25)
description: The Dinosaur Game or "Trex Jungle Dash" is a 2D single player game. It controls a small T-Rex dinosaur that runs through a forest environment while jumping over dragons that continuously come in it's way. The game has a dense flora background and it is set at the time of dawn. The goal is to survive as long as possible without hitting any dragon. The game gradually increases in speed and difficulty as the player progresses. It can be a good way to engage you for a while without requiring a high end system.
